column5: My dad has just informed me that he has a few weeks of vacation left so he want to hit a lake with some walleye and i am looking for some with pike. not asking for any ones secret holes but they are welcome    but would like a lake with some nice size of both, and one have some good recommendations   :Gonefishing:   need to get a few more trips in this year
Local or travel?(if travel, how far???)
A little difficult to answer without knowing how far you're willing to travel and where your starting point is. Do you have a boat and what size is it. Do you want day trips or camping/lodging......
it would be for a weekend so like 5hrs tops maybe a little more if it worth it (we are in caledonia)
we have a 17.5 crestliner with 115 and camping most likely
